enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: This issue was addressed in the SBI Plenary on Tuesday, 2 December.
Chair Stoycheva requested Andrea Albán (Colombia) to conduct informal consultations with the relevant contact group chairs, and prepare a draft omnibus COP decision.
On Wednesday, 10 December, SBI agreed to forward the decision to the COP, which adopted it on Friday, 12 December.
